#summary A list of every tag currently supported by the parser

= Structure Tags =
  * [TagSheet <sheet>] - Required. The root element for a character sheet
  * [TagHead <head>] - Required. Holds information about this sheet
  ** [TagSystem <system>] - Optional. The gaming system this sheet is for (oWoD; d20; RandKl etc.)
  ** [TagGame <game>] - Required. This game this sheet is for (Vampire: the Masquerade; Star Wars d20; Legend of the Five Rings; etc.)
  ** [TagName <name>] - Required. The name of this sheet (Vampire Neonate; L5R Character; Jedi; etc.)
  ** [TagCopyright <copyright>] - Required. The original copyright holder of this sheet (Wizards of the Coast; White Wolf; Alderac; etc.)
  ** [TagAuthor <author>] - Required. The person who wrote the Nerdcules XML for this sheet (your name or monicker)
  ** [TagDescription <description>] - Optional. A short description of this sheet; used for the meta description, which is referenced by search engines
  ** [TagStyle <style>] - Optional. Supplemental CSS definition for this sheet
  ** [TagScript <script>] - Optional. Supplemental script for this sheet
  * [TagSet <set>] - Required. Defines a set of attributes; a sheet must have at least one set
  ** [TagColumn <column>] - Required. Defines a column; a set must have at least one column
  * [TagBreak <break>] - Defines a printable page break
= Field Tags =
Field tags can only appear inside of a column tag.
  * [TagText <text>] - Defines a text field
  * [TagSelect <select>] - Defines a select field
  ** [TagOption <option>] - Defines an option within a select field
  * [TagDot <dot>] - Defines a Nerdcules.Dots element
  * [TagSpinner <spinner>] - Defines a Nerdcules.Spinner element
  * [TagEm <em>] - Defines a title/heading
  * [TagCheck <check>] - Defines a checkbox field
  * [TagTextarea <textarea>] - Defines a textarea field
  * [TagBlank <blank>] - Defines a blank line
